summary: Implements an emulated Philips Hue bridge API that maps Home Assistant entities to Hue‑compatible HTTP endpoints, handling retrieval and modification of the collective state, groups, and individual lights, as well as username provisioning.
business_intent: Enable Hue‑compatible devices and applications to control Home Assistant entities (lights, fans, media players, covers) through a standard Hue REST interface, providing seamless integration with third‑party Hue ecosystems.
